name: image-labeler-gcp
description: This guide provides a **step-by-step** tutorial for setting up and deploying an **AI-powered image labeling app** using **Google Cloud Vision API** on **Google Cloud Run**. It covers: - Setting up a **Google Cloud project** - Enabling **Vision API** - Configuring **IAM permissions** - Building a **Docker container** - Deploying to **Cloud Run** - Troubleshooting **common issues**
author: Lukas-J.-Melhus
